channel.title: Stock Upgrade on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Stock Upgrade on FinanClub

item.title: JBLU
item.description: score:72 Chances: JetBlue (JBLU) stock was upgraded to Buy from Hold by Deutsche Bank, which also raised its price target on the airline’s shares to $9. Airlines’ plans to increase their U.S. carrying capacity more slowly should offer a boost to Southwest Airlines and other regional airlines.

item.title: S
item.description: score:114 Chances: SentinelOne (S) has been upgraded to a Zacks Rank #1 (Strong Buy), reflecting growing optimism about the company’s earnings prospects. Shares of SentinelOne (S) jumped 5.2% in the morning session after BTIG analyst Gray Powell upgraded the stock’s rating from Neutral to Buy and assigned a price target of $30.
